data.persona: I am a goblin. My fellow goblins and I live deep in the caves. I hear some adventurers approaching, we will eat well tonight.
data.description:
You are in the Valley of doom.
The Valley of Doom is overrun by dead trees and grasses.  Eerie looking animals peer at you through the brushes.  It is a dark and wicked place.
The guest is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I must steal the hymn book to read its dark, magical incantations.
data.mid_motivation: I must cast a spell on the approaching adventurers using the instructions from the hymn book.
data.long_motivation: I must win the battle with the adventurers, and the battle will be easily won provided I cast the right spells.
